activities: Web hosting, internet service, shared, reseller, vps, and dedicated server web hosting.  Data storage and domain name registration.  HostDime provides webhosting services to its clients in the EU who may during the course of their business operations collect personal data of their customers and store that information on the company's servers.  HostDime does not independently collect personal data directly from EU citizens but may need to access its servers to perform ongoing maintenance and network security services as part of its contractual commitments with its clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data is covered including organizational and customer data, including manually processed data.
